title: Causes of U.S. victory in Revolution

content.question:
Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments

clearly and logically.

Analyze the political, diplomatic, and military reasons for the United States victory in the Revolutionary War. Confine your answer to the period 1775–1783.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
